posts.post_title: FS/FT: Huge lot of low grade T205's, T206's, T207's...MANY HOF's and SP's
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Marc Del Percio
Hello. I have the following T205's, T206's, and T207's available for sale or trade. I am epecially looking for low grade T207's and/or E90-1's in trade but will consider trades for any pre-war cards I need. 



As you can see by the scans below, many of the raw cards are in VERY poor condition and may have significant paper loss or major damage such as missing corners or edges, holes, tears, etc. These are priced accordingly. 



I have added a few cards to the list that do not appear in the scans. I'd be glad to e-mail scans of any of those if requested. Also, there are multiple copies of a few of the cards. Please be sure to specify which one you are interested in if making a purchase or trade offer on any of these. 



For purchases under $25, please add $3.00 for shipping. Any purchase of $25+ includes free shipping. I accept payment via cash, check, money order or Paypal. Thanks for looking and please e-mail with any questions or offers. 





GRADED T206: 



Lake (no ball in hand) - PSA 1(MK) pencil mark on front $18 

MARQUARD HOF (portrait) - SGC 10 $35

posts.post_title: FS/FT: Huge lot of low grade T205's, T206's, T207's...MANY HOF's and SP's
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Marc Del Percio
Geno,
The Hoblitzell has already been sold but thank you for the reply.


Dennis,
I haven't really priced the entire lot as a package but please feel free to make an offer that you feel is fair and I will certainly consider it and respond.


Eric S.,
The Tolstoi Chance is no longer available.  I don't have any other T206 Cubs in the lot but I do have several T205 Cubs listed if you are interested in any of those.



Thanks so much to all who have replied to my listing.  I am especially interested in trades.  I collect just about everything pre-war so please feel free to make any offers.
